item.description: Playing Count Aschenbach, a character loosely based on Gustav Mahler (whose gorgeous music enhances the film's pleasure), Dirk Bogarde embodies the outwardly civilized and meticulously reserved composer as he takes a rest cure in Edwardian Venice.
item.why: http://www.coolidge.org/node/2861 In director Lucchino Visconti's lush and haunting version of Thomas Mann's novella, an artist obsessed by his ideal of physical and spiritual beauty jeopardizes his own life to be near the object of his desire.
item.name: DEATH IN VENICE with psychologist and author Dr. Nancy Etcoff
